title: Pro.Evolution.Soccer.2014.Repack-z10yded
description:
Pro.Evolution.Soccer.2014.Repack-z10yded


Year: 2013 
Genre: Sport (Soccer) / 3D 
Developer: Konami Computer Entertainment Tokyo 
Publisher: Konami
Publication Type: Repack 
Language: Russian / English / French / Italian / German / Dutch / Swedish / Turkish 
Language: English 
Crack: Included

System requirements: 

OS: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP2, 7 SP1 
Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 1.8GHz or equivalent processor 
Memory: 1GB RAM 
Video: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card. 512MB Pixel Shader 
3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 6800 / ATI Radeon X1300 / Intel HD Graphics 2000/3000) 
DirectX : 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 6 GB HD space


Description: 

Pro Evolution Soccer 2014 for the first time in the history of the famous 
series of football simulators, provides comprehensive performance improvement 
in many aspects and sets new standards in the genre. The game is created on the 
new Fox Engine engine from Kojima Production, which will automate a number of 
time-consuming processes of development and provide unmatched photorealistic 
images. The basis of PES 2014 are laid out six principles that allow the player 
to immerse themselves in the atmosphere of a real football. This technology 
TrueBallTech, system Motion Animation Stability System (MASS) and PES ID, 
attention to the emotional part of the game, team tactics and all those 
little things that create a special football entourage.

Features repack

- Cut: voice other than English 
- Recoded: nothing 
- Game Version: 1.7.0.0 
- Setup time: ~ 13 minutes

- Additional content: 

+ PESEdit Patch 4.1
